txt.en: Easterlings prepare to lay siege to Dale and the Lonely Mountain. The bells of Dale must be rung to signal the inhabitants to retreat into Erebor.
Complete the quest The Bells of Dale -- Tier 2
You must defeat the Olog-hai captain Skrizg and the Easterling sorcerer Tab√Æ-kohin in Dale.
You have completed the quest The Bells of Dale -- Tier 2
